verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is the <S%G5287>assurance<s%> of <S%G4229>[things<s%>] <S%G1679>hoped<s%> for, the <S%G1650>conviction<s%> of things not <S%G991>seen.<s%>
For by it the <S%G4245>men<s%> of <S%G4245>old<s%> <S%G3140>gained<s%> <S%G3140>approval.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1802>Enoch<s%> was <S%G3346>taken<s%> up so that he should not <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G2288>death;<s%> and he was not <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3346>took<s%> him up; for he <S%G3140>obtained<s%> the <S%G3140>witness<s%> that <S%G4253>before<s%> his <S%G3331>being<s%> <S%G3331>taken<s%> up he was <S%G2100>pleasing<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> to <S%G2100>please<s%> [Him], for he who <S%G4334>comes<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> that He is, and [that] He is a <S%G3406>rewarder<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1567>seek<s%> Him.

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> he <S%G3939>lived<s%> as an <S%G3939>alien<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%> as in a <S%G245>foreign<s%> [land], <S%G2730>dwelling<s%> in <S%G4633>tents<s%> with <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> and <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> <S%G4789>fellow<s%> <S%G4789>heirs<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1860>promise;<s%>

for he was <S%G1551>looking<s%> for the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2310>foundations,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5079>architect<s%> and <S%G1217>builder<s%> is <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1352>therefore,<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> there was <S%G1096>born<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1520>man,<s%> and him as good as <S%G3499>dead<s%> at that, [as many descendants] as the <S%G798>stars<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> in <S%G4128>number,<s%> and <S%G382>innumerable<s%> as the <S%G285>sand<s%> which is by the <S%G2281>seashore.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G2865>receiving<s%> the <S%G1860>promises,<s%> but having <S%G3708>seen<s%> them and having <S%G782>welcomed<s%> them from a <S%G4207>distance,<s%> and having <S%G3670>confessed<s%> that they were <S%G3581>strangers<s%> and <S%G3927>exiles<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

For <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>things<s%> <S%G1718>make<s%> it <S%G1718>clear<s%> that they are <S%G1934>seeking<s%> a <S%G3968>country<s%> of their <S%G3968>own.<s%>

And <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they had been <S%G3421>thinking<s%> of that [country] from <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G7057>went<s%> out, they would have <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2540>opportunity<s%> to <S%G344>return.<s%>

But as it is, they <S%G3713>desire<s%> a <S%G2909>better<s%> [country], that is a <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G2032>one.<s%> <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> to be <S%G1941>called<s%> their <S%G2316>God;<s%> for He has <S%G2090>prepared<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> for them.

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> when he was <S%G3985>tested,<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> up <S%G2464>Isaac;<s%> and he who had <S%G324>received<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> was <S%G4374>offering<s%> up his <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> [son];
[it was he] to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G2980>said,<s%> "In <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> your <S%G4690>descendants<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called.<s%>"

He <S%G3049>considered<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G1453>raise<s%> [men] <S%G2532>even<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> from <S%G3606>which<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2865>received<s%> him <S%G2865>back<s%> as a <S%G3850>type.<s%>
By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> and <S%G2269>Esau,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G4012>regarding<s%> <S%G3195>things<s%> to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> as he was <S%G599>dying,<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped,<s%> [leaning] on the <S%G206>top<s%> of his <S%G4464>staff.<s%>

By <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> when he was <S%G5053>dying,<s%> <S%G3421>made<s%> <S%G3421>mention<s%> of the <S%G1841>exodus<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> and <S%G1781>gave<s%> <S%G1781>orders<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> his <S%G3747>bones.<s%>

For <S%G5550>time<s%> will <S%G1952>fail<s%> me if I <S%G1334>tell<s%> of <S%G1066>Gideon,<s%> <S%G913>Barak,<s%> <S%G4546>Samson,<s%> <S%G2422>Jephthah,<s%> of <S%G7035>David<s%> and <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%>

<S%G1135>Women<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> [back] their <S%G3498>dead<s%> by <S%G386>resurrection;<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G5178>tortured,<s%> not <S%G4327>accepting<s%> their <S%G629>release,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they might <S%G5177>obtain<s%> a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G386>resurrection;<s%>

and <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G2983>experienced<s%> <S%G3984><s%> <S%G1701>mockings<s%> and <S%G3148>scourgings,<s%> <S%G2089>yes,<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G1199>chains<s%> and <S%G5438>imprisonment.<s%>

([men] of <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> was not <S%G514>worthy<s%>), <S%G4105>wandering<s%> in <S%G2047>deserts<s%> and <S%G3735>mountains<s%> and <S%G4693>caves<s%> and <S%G3692>holes<s%> in the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>
